content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's my pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. Let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's say 600 Euros per month. This is a very good offer considering the apartment is unfurnished and in the city center, right?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your offer, but I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. How about 750 Euros per month? This is a fair price for an apartment of this caliber.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I hear you, but I think 650 Euros is more reasonable. This is a good price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center, don't you think?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While 650 Euros is a competitive price, I believe the apartment's prime location and modern amenities justify a higher rent. How about we meet in the middle at 700 Euros per month? This is a fair compromise, don't you agree?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: You have a point. Considering the apartment's location and condition, 700 Euros per month sounds fair to me. 'I agree to the price of [700] Euro!'
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment will be yours for 700 Euros per month. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
